EmailTemplate.subject: Primus Epic Easy II Upgrade – Now is the time to do it
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
We know that all you want is to be back in the air, but why not take advantage of this time on ground to update your cockpit?
Honeywell and Dassault Aircraft Services have the right solution to elevate the performance of your cockpit in terms of safety and situational awareness with Primus Epic for EASy II.
Primus Epic for Dassault EASy features large, landscape flat-panel displays, intuitive navigation and patented Graphical Flight Planning functionality for modifying routes quickly and safely, as well as monitoring weather, terrain and air traffic.
Featured upgrades include the SmartView Synthetic Vision System, satellite-based augmentation system approaches, Automatic Descent Mode, the SmartRunway / SmartLanding runway awareness and advisory System, Controller Pilot Data Link Communication, flight management system improvements and more.
